articles.author: Sy Mukherjee
articles.title: Smoking, coronavirus, and the deaths of Chinese men
articles.description: We've learned a lot more about the coronavirus over the past week—including the potential effect that smoking has on the pathogen's spread.

articles.author: Sy Mukherjee
articles.title: China’s high smoking rate may be exacerbating the coronavirus outbreak
articles.description: China's sky high smoking rate among men may help explain why they're more susceptible to coronavirus infection and death.

articles.author: Ian Mount
articles.title: Coronavirus hits China’s workers as businesses say they can’t pay wages now
articles.description: A growing number of China’s private companies have cut wages, delayed paychecks or stopped paying staff completely, saying that the economic toll of the coronavirus has left them unable to cover their labor costs. To slow the spread of the virus that’s claime…

articles.author: Karen Yuan
articles.title: Gold is nearing a 7-year high. But it can’t keep pace with Big Tech
articles.description: Coronavirus uncertainty has driven up the price of gold, a classic safe-haven bet. But the Nasdaq has surged even more since the start of the year.

articles.author: Naomi Xu Elegant
articles.title: Coronavirus misinformation in China is fueled by new force: government mistrust - Fortune
articles.description: Fake news and junk science are festering in virus-racked China, where uncertainty reigns.

articles.author: Jenna Schnuer
articles.title: Asian American businesses are struggling because of unfounded coronavirus fear
articles.description: "Please do not allow stigma, xenophobia or fear to control your decisions," said Allison Arwady, commissioner of the Chicago Department of Public Health.
